se.mattec.id2212.project.view

Class ShopManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.mattec.id2212.project.view.ShopManager

  • @Named(value="shopManager")
public class ShopManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A manager linking between the JSF user interface and the application logic in ShopBean.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ShopManager()
      Creates the ShopManager.
